1QWyVhcu8GVKETtaU6K-ig.text: This is a hole in wall taco place and so good.   It was a rainy day so I don't think think the employee anticipated how many pick up orders were coming through as well as a few parties coming in. He explained the situation, apologized, and said he reached out to a co-worker to come help. Poor guy was hustling.   With that, when he made my tacos, they were a bit sloppy but since he was rushed - he loaded them!  I got the hard tacos with barbocoa beef. Very tasty!! I couldn't finish al 3 since they were so loaded.   They had so many condiments to choose from at a counter away from the food order spot. We food a couple of bar stool seats on a ledge facing the window.   I'm glad we stopped in here and surprised how well Scotland can do Mexican!

photos.caption: Photo of El Toro Loco - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. 3 hard tacos (barbacoa beef)
Photo of El Toro Loco - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. So many condiments to choose from

R8qKkKN-kos17scj1KuViQ.text: Solid make your own tacos place for a good price in the Grassmarket. They only had hard corn tacos, a soft taco option would be nice. I opted to get one of each meat option on my tacos. They were all pretty tasty, however one of the meats was a bit cold.

photos.caption: Photo of El Toro Loco - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Tacos

gRAUms9q5cFtJ7bvUy7cmw.text: We ordered tacos here. It was close to our hotel and the prices were decent. Food was good. No complaints.

M6sRx20hhxYkO2EU2h1eoA.text: Amazing drinks and a really lovely staff! Didn't get food but everything looked picture perfect!

VycjXFLUFqKT80bkUasXLA.text: Ate lunch here and it was so so. The food tastier bland and I saw the girl behind the counter spraying cleaner on the place where all the food was to clean it and I'm sure cleaner got in to the food. The chips were like  aging cardboard and stale. The only good thing is it was cheap. We got a chicken burrito and chicken quesadilla and chips and guacamole for under 20 pounds. But I would get your Tex Mex fix somewhere else!

ByK62Kv5SVeEuzfeBqXA2A.text: Good Mexican Food and good prices. Nice to take a fast snack. We enjojed the bowls and burritos with fresh vegetable and meat.

HpMyuPY60nj35P8v8GO5eQ.text: Ate here twice during our 3 day visit here in Edinburgh. Super friendly staff & fast service. We ordered the beef & pork burritos, quesadillas, chips & guacamole with Pale Ale beers. We enjoyed the pork burrito the most and my 4 year old son really loved his quesadillas. Definitely recommend this place !

1dpfkkpal_pH5jHQcnOZKw.text: Great Mexican spot in old town Edinburgh. Options of big burritos, tacos, quesadillas, or bowls. Breakfast too!! Eat in or carry out. Super reasonable prices (6 beef burrito) and friendly staff. Check it out if you're craving some Mexican/TexMex in Scotland!!

uE5_SWy_QmbJwglg3WAfhw.text: Having lived in Edinburgh for many years its nice to finally see places like this opening up. Mexican street food is always delicious and considering their very central location its cheap too! The options make it quick and easy to order, your food is prepared right there and then. The chill vibe and friendly staff definitely have my support. Mexican street food is great!

4XahNXs4LakOcaqy4g5rZA.text: I ate there last night with my family. We are visiting out of country and have tasted some great Mexican food from California, the American Southwest, and Texas. What we ate last night was not Mexican food, or even palatable food at all. The food was the most flavorless, bland, and unseasoned food I have eaten in my life and my family agrees. We ordered buritos, three tacos, and a quesadilla. All three of those foods were awful! There was too much rice, flavorless beans, and unseasoned and runny meat within the burritos and the tacos. Also, the tacos shells were very stale and chewy. The quesadilla had too much salsa (with corn, which was strange) and meat. Not only was the food very unsatisfying (and expensive), the professionalism of the cooks was lacking as well. Their customer service was very poor, as they cracked jokes and smiled at each other while the line grew not only within the restaurant  but also the take out orders. They were in fact behind by several call-in orders. All in all, if my family and I could give this place half a star, we would gladly. Tourists, stay away from this place!
